title: NeuronComponentSchemaFormat
description: Meta-schema that describes the expected format of neuron-ui component schema files. Use this to validate that each *.schema.json conforms to the project's conventions.

title.description: Component props interface name. Must follow the pattern N<ComponentName>Props (e.g. NButtonProps, NCardProps).

description.description: Human-readable description of the component and its purpose. Should be sufficiently detailed (at least 10 characters).

type.description: Root type must always be 'object' since component props are object types.

properties.description: Map of prop names to their JSON Schema definitions. Each property must have a type and description.

type.description: JSON Schema type of the property.

oneOf.description: Alternative: use oneOf instead of type for union types.

description.description: Human-readable description of what this prop does.

enum.description: Allowed values for string enum props.

default.description: Default value for the prop if not provided.

items.description: Schema for array item types when type is 'array'.

required.description: Required fields for nested object types.

additionalProperties.description: Whether additional properties are allowed in nested objects.

const.description: Fixed constant value for the property.

minItems.description: Minimum number of items for array types.

maxItems.description: Maximum number of items for array types.

required.description: List of required prop names. Can be an empty array if all props are optional.

additionalProperties.description: Must be false â€” component schemas do not allow arbitrary extra props.
